version_description:
Increased mission reward

Aircraft（Addition）
・F-35C (air to air)
・F-2 (harpoon)
・SH60K (helicopter)
・Helicopter flight deck
（Adjustment）
・Aichi M6 can take off from the catapult
・Landing of Jet planes
・Elevator two

Weapon（Addition）
・US 5 inch single gun
・German 28.3cm triple gun
・English 38.1cm twin gun
・Oto Melara 5 inch gun
（adjustment）
・Underwater torpedo (Shooting range)

Engines (Addition)
・US cruiser type
・US destroyer type
・English battleship type
・Gas Turbine

Shooting accuracy enhancement （Addition）
・Arleigh Burke mast
・Comsate
（Adjustment）
・Parameter, logic

Parts with camera view (New)
・Bridge
・Periscope

Decoration（Addition）
・US Crane
・Various thin cylinder
・Various catwalk
・Various catwalk with deck

Hull (Addition)
・x4 size various parts
・Heavy Ballast 2x2x1

New Mission
・Submarine
・Modern air carrier

Explanation of parts added (displayed by press “i” button)

Increased mission reward

Aircraft（Addition）
・F-35C (air to air)
・F-2 (harpoon)
・SH60K (helicopter)
・Helicopter flight deck
（Adjustment）
・Aichi M6 can take off from the catapult
・Landing of Jet planes
・Elevator two

Weapon（Addition）
・US 5 inch single gun
・German 28.3cm triple gun
・English 38.1cm twin gun
・Oto Melara 5 inch gun
（adjustment）
・Underwater torpedo (Shooting range)

Engines (Addition)
・US cruiser type
・US destroyer type
・English battleship type
・Gas Turbine

Shooting accuracy enhancement （Addition）
・Arleigh Burke mast
・Comsate
（Adjustment）
・Parameter, logic

Parts with camera view (New)
・Bridge
・Periscope

Decoration（Addition）
・US Crane
・Various thin cylinder
・Various catwalk
・Various catwalk with deck

Hull (Addition)
・x4 size various parts
・Heavy Ballast 2x2x1

New Mission
・Submarine
・Modern air carrier

Explanation of parts added (displayed by press “i” button)

Bug fixes. Modern air carrier body added.

New parts
Modern aircraft
・FA-14 (air to air missile)
・V-22 Osprey
・E2C Hawkeye

Aircraft
・Ju87C Stuka
・OS2U Kingfisher

Weapon
・Phalanx (CIWS)
・Harpoon
・Multiple rocket launcher
・U.S. 12inch triple gun
・Italy 15.2cm triple gun
・Italy 32cm dual gun
・Italy 32cm triple gun
・Italy 38cm triple gun
・12cm gun with shield

Decoration
・Ship number
・Ship number on deck
・RHIB: Rigid-hulled inflatable boat
・Deck crane
・British crane
・Lattice Mast (Cage Mast)
・Various plate parts

Parts with camera view
・Modern periscope
・Modern periscope set

Engine
・Italian battleship type
・Italian cruiser type

New Function
・Auto anti-air function

New Missions
・Upgraded modern air carrier
・Missile cruiser
・Osprey carrier

New game scene
・Morning Sea
・Sunset Sea

Bug fixes. Modern air carrier body added.

New parts
Modern aircraft
・FA-14 (air to air missile)
・V-22 Osprey
・E2C Hawkeye

Aircraft
・Ju87C Stuka
・OS2U Kingfisher

Weapon
・Phalanx (CIWS)
・Harpoon
・Multiple rocket launcher
・U.S. 12inch triple gun
・Italy 15.2cm triple gun
・Italy 32cm dual gun
・Italy 32cm triple gun
・Italy 38cm triple gun
・12cm gun with shield

Decoration
・Ship number
・Ship number on deck
・RHIB: Rigid-hulled inflatable boat
・Deck crane
・British crane
・Lattice Mast (Cage Mast)
・Various plate parts

Parts with camera view
・Modern periscope
・Modern periscope set

Engine
・Italian battleship type
・Italian cruiser type

New Function
・Auto anti-air function

New Missions
・Upgraded modern air carrier
・Missile cruiser
・Osprey carrier

New game scene
・Morning Sea
・Sunset Sea

New parts

Weapon
・Vertical Launching System (VLS)
・Tripple torpedo tube (Homing)
・Underwater torpedo tube (Homing)
・Oerlikon FF 20mm cannon
・Vickers QF 2 pounder gun (Known as pom-pom)

Modern aircraft
・X-47B (Powerful homing bomber)
・F-22 (Air to air missile)
・Su-33 (Air to air missile)

Shooting Accuracy Enhancement
・Various phased array radars to enhance VLS shooting accuracy

Decoration
・Submarine rudder

New Missions
・AEGIS
・Nuclear Submarine
・Modern carrier with AEGIS
and combinations of above.

Link button placed on the title page
・To Game Tutorial web site
・To Gallery web site

Parts Adjustment
・Harpoon adjusted to have limited range homing function.
・Airplane taxiing speed up when on the deck.
・Parameter changed for some parts.

New parts

Weapon
・Vertical Launching System (VLS)
・Tripple torpedo tube (Homing)
・Underwater torpedo tube (Homing)
・Oerlikon FF 20mm cannon
・Vickers QF 2 pounder gun (Known as pom-pom)

Modern aircraft
・X-47B (Powerful homing bomber)
・F-22 (Air to air missile)
・Su-33 (Air to air missile)

Shooting Accuracy Enhancement
・Various phased array radars to enhance VLS shooting accuracy

Decoration
・Submarine rudder

New Missions
・AEGIS
・Nuclear Submarine
・Modern carrier with AEGIS
and combinations of above.

Link button placed on the title page
・To Game Tutorial web site
・To Gallery web site

Parts Adjustment
・Harpoon adjusted to have limited range homing function.
・Airplane taxiing speed up when on the deck.
・Parameter changed for some parts.

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

New parts

Hull
・Hepta（3x2x1,4x2x1, 5x2x1, 5x1x1）
・Tetra（3x2x1,4x2x1, 5x2x1, 5x1x1）
・Various mini hull parts which have 0.5 size length.

Deck
・Hepta（3x1x2, 4x1x2, 5x1x2, 5x1x1）
・Tetra（3x1x2, 4x1x2, 5x1x2, 5x1x1）
・Various mini hull parts which have 0.5 size length.

Bridge （1x0.5.x1）

Correction of Submarine rudder (decoration)
Bug fix
